results.name: Onboard Turborepo monorepo
results.summary: The documentation comprehensively covers the Turborepo monorepo structure with detailed container and component documentation. However, it fails expectation 1 because no .c3/README.md file was created - the c3-index.md and c3-context.md serve similar purposes but don't satisfy the specific README.md requirement.

results.name: Design greenfield SaaS with C3
results.summary: The agent successfully created a comprehensive C3 architecture documentation for TaskFlow SaaS, including ADR-000 as the system blueprint, context documentation, four container definitions, extensive real-time/WebSocket coverage, and component placeholders for all key features including auth, tasks, and team-related functionality.

results.name: Onboard simple Express app
results.summary: All expectations are fully met. The documentation comprehensively covers the Simple Shop API with proper C3 structure, correctly classifies auth middleware as foundation and users/products as feature components, and includes the required ADR-000 adoption decision.

results.name: Query existing C3 architecture
results.summary: The agent successfully navigated the C3 documentation structure, correctly identified auth middleware (c3-102) and task routes (c3-103), properly distinguished foundation from feature components, and relied entirely on existing .c3/ documentation rather than re-analyzing source code.

results.name: Audit C3 docs for stale references
results.summary: The agent successfully identified all 4 stale component references (c3-102 through c3-105) and recognized the v2 consolidation into index.ts. However, it failed to provide explicit actionable recommendations for updating the documentation, instead only marking items as STALE without suggesting concrete remediation steps.

results.name: Add new feature via C3 alter workflow
results.summary: The agent successfully followed the C3 alter workflow by creating an ADR first (adr-20260112-notification-routes.md), getting approval, then creating the component documentation (c3-106-notification-routes.md) and updating the container README. All dependencies on c3-102 and c3-105 are properly documented.
